short_summary: Audio-Visual Event Support PSIB STREAM ctr.
description: Support for Audio-Visual events in PSIB STREAM ctr.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Audio-Visual Event Support PSIB STREAM Tender Announcement**
---------------------------------------------------------

### Reference Information

* **Contract Reference:** WS4417687891 - Doc4452547713
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Publications Date:** February 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 11, 2024 at 14:00:00

### Tender Details

This *Request for Standing Offer* is for the provision of audio-visualevent support services. The contract number is WS4417687891, with amendment number 5.

### Tender Criteria

The tender is valued at $541,600. The selection criteria for the tender include *Lowest Price*. Bartering and price adjustment provisions are covered by the agreement.

### Trade Agreements

Satisfying trade agreement requirements, this tender complies with the *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement * and others.

### General Information

The end-user entities for this service are *Department of National Defence (DND)*. 

### Contracting and Purchasing Agencies

The contracting party is the *Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)* located at *11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage. Gatineau, Quebec.* Their primary address and primary contact information is listed in enclosures. 

The *Department of National Defence (DND)* is not the primary contracting party but serves as the end-user of the proposed service.

### Contact Information

*Canas, Jessica* of the PSPC is the primary contact for this contract information at [jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Notice URL

A copy of the tender can be downloaded from [Notice URL] at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18851987?extsite=MTg4NTE5ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Submit

Bids must be submitted by [Tender Closing Date] for consideration. Failure to adhere to the closing date will render the bid non-responsive. If you experience any further difficulties or disputes, you can contact the *Minister's Commision for Supplier Index (MSCI) * at their Contact Information.
